items.title: Pope expresses sadness after Israeli strike on Gaza church kills three
items.description: Israel says it regrets any harm to a religious site or uninvolved civilians after a shell hits the Catholic Church of the Holy Family.

items.title: Iraq's shopping centre fire leaves 61 dead, many missing
items.description: Videos on social media appear to show a number of people on the roof during the fire in the city of Kut.

items.title: Plans for direct train to Berlin in new UK-Germany treaty
items.description: It comes as Friedrich Merz makes his first official visit to the UK as German chancellor.

items.title: Ariana Grande says she's not abandoning music for film
items.description: The US singer insists there's still room for music after being cast in another film this week.

items.title: Sirens and evacuations as Taipei rehearses to counter China invasion threat
items.description: Taiwan's capital is holding one of its largest ever civil defence exercises.
